alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Miami (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 29 at 3:25PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of east central Kansas and west central Missouri, including the following counties, in east central Kansas, Johnson KS and Miami. In west central Missouri, Cass. * WHEN...Until 630 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 325 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Overland Park, Lee`s Summit, Belton, Raymore, Gardner, Harrisonville, Pleasant Hill, Spring Hill, Peculiar, Edgerton, Lake Winnebago, Cleveland, Baldwin Park, Strasburg, Stillwell, Bucyrus, Chiles, Wagstaff and Hillsdale. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
